scone.keyboard



struct KeyEvent;
Key event structure Contains general information about a key press

Note:
Does not work on POSIX yet!

@property auto pressed();
Check if the button is pressed or released.

Returns:
bool, true if pressed, false if not

@property auto key();
Get the key being pressed down.

Returns:
Key (enum) of the key being pressed

auto hasControlKey(ControlKey ck);
Check to see if the KeyEvent has a certain control key pressed.

Returns:
true, if all control keys entered are pressed

Example:
foreach(input; getInputs())
{
    if(input.hasControlKey(ControlKey.CTRL | ControlKey.ALT | ControlKey.SHIFT))
    {
        //do something...
    }
}


@property auto repeated();
Check the amount of times an event has been repeated since last check (held down).

Returns:
int, the amount of repeats

Note:
This is a bit unstable. I suggest you don't use /vladde

@property auto controlKey();
Get control all keys

Returns:
enum ControlKey

auto getInputs();
Get all inputs since last function call.

Returns:
KeyEvent[], of all key presses since last call (Windows) Note: Can store a maximum of 128 key presses. This should however not be a problem, since 
getInputs()
should be called each game tick

auto clearInputs();
Clears all buffered inputs. Useful if you have a loading screen of some sort, and need to clear key presses once loaded.

SK_UNKNOWN
Unknown key (Should never appear. If do, please report bug)

SK_PACKET
Used to pass Unicode characters as if they were keystrokes. The SK_PACKET key is the low word of a 32-bit Virtual Key value used for non-keyboard input methods. For more information, see Remark in KEYBDINPUT, SendInput, WM_KEYDOWN, and WM_KEYUP

SK_OEM_102
Either the angle bracket key or the backslash key on the RT 102-key keyboard

SK_CANCEL
Control-break processing

enum ControlKey: int;
Control keys. Reason to why these are in a enum is because it must not be confused with their SK_* counter part.

NONE
No control key is being pressed

CAPSLOCK
CAPS LOCK light is activated

NUMLOCK
NUM LOCK is activated

SCROLLLOCK
SCROLL LOCK is activated

SHIFT
SHIFT key is pressed

ENHANCED
The key is enhanced (?)

ALT
Left or right ALT key is pressed

CTRL
Left or right CTRL key is pressed
